content: आघ्रा {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To smell, smell at; गंधमाघ्राय <ls>Me. 21.</ls> {@--2@} To kiss, touch (with the nose) as the head; <ls>Bk. 14. 12.</ls> {@--3@} (Fig.) To attack, devour, seize upon; मामाघ्रातुमागतवान् <ls>Dk. 6</ls>; कामाघ्रातया अनया <ls n="Dk.">116</ls> smitten, affected; <ls>Māl. 5. 29</ls>; <ls>Bh. 3. 104.</ls>
